name: gapHub-wp-directory
author: amar@gaphub

sections.description:
gapHub-wp-directoryis a plugin to make your WordPress blog a membership driven site.

Features:

  • Create custom membership fields.
  • Set your Field validation as you want.
  • Action and filter hooks for extensibility.

The plugin installs with additional custom fields to the membership process. Using the gapHub-wp-directoryadmin panel, you can create additional fields and delete existing ones. This offers you a premium content site with a professional and branded look and feel. It also provides an opportunity for the user to register without leaving the page. There are also some special pages that can be created with simple shortcodes:

  • A Members Area where members can fill their information and upload their image.
  • A Search Area where members can Search professionals.
sections.installation:
gapHub-wp-directory is designed to run “out-of-the-box” with no modifications to your WP installation necessary. Please follow the installation instructions below.

Basic Install:

We recommend following the instructions that covers all of the plugin’s features in depth. 1. Upload the /gh-wpdirectory/ directory and its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory 2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Additional Settings and Information

Special and Optional Shortcode Pages

  • To use membership form on your page or post, add a new page or post and in the body of this page or post, place the shortcode [ghub_directory] where you want gapHub-wp-directory to display its membership form.

  • To use Search form on your page or post, add a new page or post and in the body of this page or post, place the shortcode [ghub_searchdir] where you want gapHub-wp-directory to search your members.You can manage your search page from the gapHub-wp-directory admin panel menu. Tag:wp-directory, member directory, membership form, directory, search directory, search form. Note: the above shortcodes CANNOT be used on the same page!

short_description: gapHub-wp-directoryis a free membership management system for WordPress that permits user to create and search all types of directory.
